Constructor Detail

RoutingTable

public RoutingTable(RouteManager rm)
Method Detail

addRoutingEntry

public boolean addRoutingEntry(RoutingTableEntry rte)
Adds a routing element to the routing table. This is used both for a new element as well as an update. It removes the old element if it exists and adds the new under the Destination address of the RoutingTableEntry

Parameters:
rte - the routing table entry to add

removeRoutingEntry

public boolean removeRoutingEntry(long destination)
Does not delete routes .. marks them as invalid

Parameters:
destination - the destination to mark as invalid

deleteRoutingEntry

public void deleteRoutingEntry(long l)
Deletes the route permanently from the routing table

Parameters:
l - the destination to mark as invalid

Gets the routing table entry from an address

Parameters:
destination - the address to lookuo
Returns:
the routing table entry from the address

getRoutesAsVectorChanged

public java.util.Vector<RoutingTableEntry> getRoutesAsVectorChanged(boolean sendMe)
Returns all routes that have changed

Parameters:
sendMe - adds your own address to the vector
Returns:
all routes that have changed

getRoutesAsVectorInvalid

public java.util.Vector<RoutingTableEntry> getRoutesAsVectorInvalid(long dest)
Gets all routes that use dest as the next hop. This is used to invalidate all routes going through a known bad node

Parameters:
dest - destination
Returns:
the routes to be marked as invalid
